definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)

sentences.english: But external hemorrhoids usually resolve in a week or so.
sentences.chinese: 一般而言，外痔引起的不适可在一周左右解除。

sentences.english: Typically, the modem is connected to one of the serial ports on the computer.
sentences.chinese: 一般而言，数据机会连接至电脑上的其中一个序列埠。

sentences.english: Generally, WNV is spread by the bite of an infected mosquito.
sentences.chinese: 一般而言，西尼罗河病毒是由受到感染的蚊子传播的。

sentences.english: It is generally speaking a feared and evil beast.
sentences.chinese: 一般而言，龙是一种邪恶而可怖的猛兽。

sentences.english: In general the uses of the two-nitriding processes are similar.
sentences.chinese: 一般而言两种渗氮方法的用途是类似的。

sentences.english: In general use order to lock in the current lock loss or profit.
sentences.chinese: 一般而言使用锁单来锁定目前的损失或利润。

sentences.english: Generally speaking, about 30 kinds of colors of silk strands will be used when weaving carpets.
sentences.chinese: 一般而言，一块丝毯要用上三十来种不同颜色的丝线。

sentences.english: Incubation lasts for 42 to 45 days before the chicks hatch.
sentences.chinese: 一般而言，孵蛋的工作为期约42到45天。

sentences.english: Truffles in general are among the most expensive foods in the world.
sentences.chinese: 一般而言，块菌是世界上最昂贵的食物。

sentences.english: In general, each field of law and procedure has its distinct set of terminology.
sentences.chinese: 一般而言，每门法科和每种法律程序均有其一套词汇。

sentences.english: In general, females produce a litter every year aardvark.
sentences.chinese: 一般而言，雌性土豚每年产一胎。

sentences.english: In general, sending a message on queue is an asynchronous activity.
sentences.chinese: 一般而言，在队列中发送消息是一个异步的活动。

sentences.english: In general, WHO does not recommend the use of antiviral drugs for prophylactic purposes.
sentences.chinese: 一般而言，世卫组织不建议使用抗病毒药物进行预防。

sentences.english: In general, you can create IVR scenarios by yourself in IVCM.
sentences.chinese: 一般而言，你可以在自己创造的这套IVCM情景。

sentences.english: Generally speaking, there are many fine shadings of status through the social hierarchy.
sentences.chinese: 一般而言，透过社会等级透析出许多细微的身份区别。

sentences.english: It is adviced that you come to work dressed according to your salary.
sentences.chinese: 一般而言，工作时间的衣着和工资是要相称的。

definition: usually/in many cases/more often than not
for the most part/many/most/the greater part/mostly
only if (..., or otherwise, ...)/only when/only in the case that/unless
in simple terms/to put things simply/briefly
therefore/as a result/thus/and as a result, ...
